text:
Spectrm | Full-Time | Berlin | ONSITE | https://spectrm.de

We are looking for an experienced PHP-frontend developer (f/m) to build a team with the mission of improving and extending the CMS for our partners.

Check our Job-Ad here: https://medium.com/work-at-spectrm/frontend-developer-98bc1a...

We are looking forward to your applications!
